Wait Until Element Is Visible

kw.name: Verificar Mensagem Email já Associado
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//p[contains(text(), "This email is already associated")]' not visible after 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//p[contains(text(), "This email is already associated")]' not visible after 5 seconds.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: This email is already associated with an existing account
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
Esta Keyword verifica se aparece o aviso de email já existente

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
